modlogs.description: View moderation logs for a user.

parameters.member: The member to view logs for

parameters.auto_mute: If the member will be automatically muted (3+ warnings)

mute.description: Mutes a member for a specified duration

clean.description: Clean the bot's messages and commands

role.description: Toggle a role for a member

lock.description: Lock a channel for a specific role

parameters.channel: The channel to lock (default is current channel)
parameters.role: The role to lock the channel for (default is 'Member')

parameters.channel: The channel to unlock (default is current channel)
parameters.role: The role to unlock the channel for (default is 'Member')

slowmode.description: Sets or removes slowmode delay for a channel

parameters.delay: Slowmode delay in seconds (max 21600, omit for no slowmode)
parameters.channel: Channel to set slowmode in (default is current channel)

parameters.member: The member to change nickname for

mute.description: Timeout/mute a member for a specified duration

unmute.description: Removes a timeout/mute from a member

warn.description: Issues a warning to a member

parameters.auto_mute: Whether to automatically mute after multiple warnings

parameters.member: Member to check warnings for (default is self)

note.description: Add a note to a member's record

parameters.member: Member to view notes for (default is self)

kick.description: Kicks a member from the server

modlogs.description: View all moderation actions for a member

modstats.description: View moderation statistics for a moderator

parameters.member: Moderator to check stats for (default is self)

user.description: Purges messages from a specific user
